pages.title: Active Totems
pages.text: Active totems are totems that activate when a condition is met. This condition could be when you right click the totem, or when you die.$(br)To create an active totem, combine a totem base with two emeralds. To make your new active totem usful you will need to add activators and effects to it.
An unsuspecting player getting saved by their upgraded active totem.
